name: Piranha Plant
desc: A classic-style Piranha Plant. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Piranha Plant, red stem
desc: A classc-style Piranha Plant. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Venus Piranha Plant
desc: A Venus Piranha Plant that shoots one fireball at Mario. It stays hidden if he is near it.

name: Venus Piranha Plant, shoot two
desc: A Venus Piranha Plant that shoots two fireballs at Mario. It stays hidden if he is near it.

name: Venus Piranha Plant, red stem
desc: A Venus Piranha Plant that shoots one fireball at Mario. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Venus Piranha Plant, red stem shoot two
desc: A Venus Piranha Plant that shoots two fireballs at Mario. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant (left)
desc: A classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the left. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant (right)
desc: A classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the right. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant red stem (left)
desc: A classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the left. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant red stem (right)
desc: A classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the right. It ignores Mario's proximity.
